sentences.sContent: A small group of journalists waited on the pavement outside her house.
sentences.sCn: 有一小群记者守候在她家外面的人行道上。

sentences.sContent: As she fell off the bike, her head hit the pavement.
sentences.sCn: 她从自行车上摔下来，头部撞在了路面上。

phrases.pCn: 混凝土路面；混凝土面层
没住宿地；徘徊街头；被遗弃
柔性路面；沥青路面；柔性地面铺装

trans.tranOther: a hard level surface or path at the side of a road for people to walk on
